page.title: 14A working Saturday-St.Helens
page.content: On a Saturday I get up at eight o'clock.After washing and cleaning my teeth, I go down stairs for my breakfast.My mother says we are going to Widnes so I get dressed and we set out at nine o'clock in the car. My mum has a stall to sell jumpers and skirts.I help my mum to set the stall up and then I go to the cafe.I get a cup of tea for her and a cola for me.If my mum is busy I help to serve the customers.I help on another stall as well.I tidy up behind the stalls.At about half past one I go to the chip shop for our dinner.My mum has chips and curry,while I have chips and peas.We begin to tidy things away at five o'clock.We go home in the car.
